uint32_t CTRL; 00485 __IO uint32_t RNR; 00486 __IO uint32_t RBAR; 00487 __IO uint32_t RASR; 00488 } MPU_Type; 00489 00490 /* MPU Type Register */ 00491 #define MPU_TYPE_IREGION_Pos 16 00492 #define 00498 #define MPU_TYPE_SEPARATE_Msk (1UL << MPU_TYPE_SEPARATE_Pos) 00500 /* MPU Control Register */ 00501 #define MPU_CTRL_PRIVDEFENA_Pos 2 00502 #define MPU_CTRL_PRIVDEFENA_Msk (1UL << MPU_CTRL_PRIVDEFENA_Pos) 00504 #define MPU_CTRL_HFNMIENA_Pos 1 00505 #define MPU_CTRL_HFNMIENA_Msk (1UL << MPU_CTRL_HFNMIENA_Pos) 00507 #define MPU_CTRL_ENABLE_Pos 0 00508 #define MPU_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk (1UL << MPU_CTRL_ENABLE_Pos) 00510 /* MPU Region Number Register */ 00511 #define MPU_RNR_REGION_Pos 0 00512 #define MPU_RNR_REGION_Msk (0xFFUL << MPU_RNR_REGION_Pos) 00514 /* MPU Region Base Address Register */ 00515 #define MPU_RBAR_ADDR_Pos 8 00516 #define MPU_RBAR_ADDR_Msk (0xFFFFFFUL << MPU_RBAR_ADDR_Pos) 00518 #define MPU_RBAR_VALID_Pos 4 00519 #define MPU_RBAR_VALID_Msk (1UL << MPU_RBAR_VALID_Pos) 00521 #define MPU_RBAR_REGION_Pos 0 00522 #define MPU_RBAR_REGION_Msk (0xFUL << MPU_RBAR_REGION_Pos) 00524 /* MPU Region Attribute and Size Register */ 00525 #define MPU_RASR_ATTRS_Pos 16 00526 #define MPU_RASR_ATTRS_Msk (0xFFFFUL << MPU_RASR_ATTRS_Pos) 00528 #define MPU_RASR_XN_Pos 28 00529 #define MPU_RASR_XN_Msk (1UL << MPU_RASR_XN_Pos) 00531 #define MPU_RASR_AP_Pos 24 00532 #define MPU_RASR_AP_Msk (0x7UL << MPU_RASR_AP_Pos) 00534 #define MPU_RASR_TEX_Pos 19 00535 #define MPU_RASR_TEX_Msk (0x7UL << MPU_RASR_TEX_Pos) 00537 #define MPU_RASR_S_Pos 18 00538 #define MPU_RASR_S_Msk (1UL << MPU_RASR_S_Pos) 00540 #define MPU_RASR_C_Pos 17 00541 #define MPU_RASR_C_Msk (1UL << MPU_RASR_C_Pos) 00543 #define MPU_RASR_B_Pos 16 00544 #define MPU_RASR_B_Msk (1UL << MPU_RASR_B_Pos) 00546 #define MPU_RASR_SRD_Pos 8 00547 #define MPU_RASR_SRD_Msk (0xFFUL << MPU_RASR_SRD_Pos) 00549 #define MPU_RASR_SIZE_Pos 1 00550 #define MPU_RASR_SIZE_Msk (0x1FUL << MPU_RASR_SIZE_Pos) 00552 #define MPU_RASR_ENABLE_Pos 0 00553 #define MPU_RASR_ENABLE_Msk (1UL << MPU_RASR_ENABLE_Pos) 00556 #endif 00557 00558 00575 /* Memory mapping of Cortex-M0+ Hardware */ 00576 #define SCS_BASE (0xE000E000UL) 00577 #define SysTick_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0010UL) 00578 #define NVIC_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0100UL) 00579 #define SCB_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0D00UL) 00581 #define SCB ((SCB_Type *) SCB_BASE ) 00582 #define SysTick ((SysTick_Type *) SysTick_BASE ) 00583 #define NVIC ((NVIC_Type *) NVIC_BASE ) 00585 #if (__MPU_PRESENT == 1) 00586 #define MPU_BASE (SCS_BASE + 0x0D90UL) 00587 #define MPU ((MPU_Type *) MPU_BASE ) 00588 #endif 00589 00594 /******************************************************************************* 00595 * Hardware Abstraction Layer 00596 Core Function Interface contains: 00597 - Core NVIC Functions 00598 - Core SysTick Functions 00599 - Core Register Access Functions 00600 ******************************************************************************/ 00606 /* ########################## NVIC functions #################################### */ 00613 /* Interrupt Priorities are WORD accessible only under ARMv6M */ 00614 /* The following MACROS handle generation of the register offset and byte masks */ 00615 #define _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ( (((uint32_t)(IRQn) ) & 0x03) * 8 ) 00616 #define _SHP_IDX(IRQn) ( ((((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x0F)-8) >> 2) ) 00617 #define _IP_IDX(IRQn) ( ((uint32_t)(IRQn) >> 2) ) 00618 00619 00626 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_EnableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00627 { 00628 NVIC->ISER[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); 00629 } 00630 00631 00638 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_DisableIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00639 { 00640 NVIC->ICER[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); 00641 } 00642 00643 00654 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t NVIC_GetPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00655 { 00656 return((uint32_t) ((NVIC->ISPR[0] & (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)))?1:0)); 00657 } 00658 00659 00666 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_SetPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00667 { 00668 NVIC->ISPR[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); 00669 } 00670 00671 00678 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00679 { 00680 NVIC->ICPR[0] = (1 << ((uint32_t)(IRQn) & 0x1F)); /* Clear pending interrupt */ 00681 } 00682 00683 00693 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_SetPriority(IRQn_Type IRQn, uint32_t priority) 00694 { 00695 if(IRQn < 0) { 00696 SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] = (SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] & ~(0xFF << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))) | 00697 (((priority << (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) & 0xFF) << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn)); } 00698 else { 00699 NVIC->IP[_IP_IDX(IRQn)] = (NVIC->IP[_IP_IDX(IRQn)] & ~(0xFF << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn))) | 00700 (((priority << (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS)) & 0xFF) << _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn)); } 00701 } 00702 00703 00715 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t NVIC_GetPriority(IRQn_Type IRQn) 00716 { 00717 00718 if(IRQn < 0) { 00719 return((uint32_t)(((SCB->SHP[_SHP_IDX(IRQn)] >> _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ) & 0xFF) >> (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS))); } /* get priority for Cortex-M0 system interrupts */ 00720 else { 00721 return((uint32_t)(((NVIC->IP[ _IP_IDX(IRQn)] >> _BIT_SHIFT(IRQn) ) & 0xFF) >> (8 - __NVIC_PRIO_BITS))); } /* get priority for device specific interrupts */ 00722 } 00723 00724 00729 __STATIC_INLINE void NVIC_SystemReset(void) 00730 { 00731 __DSB(); /* Ensure all outstanding memory accesses included 00732 buffered write are completed before reset */ 00733 SCB->AIRCR = ((0x5FA << SCB_AIRCR_VECTKEY_Pos) | 00734 SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_Msk); 00735 __DSB(); /* Ensure completion of memory access */ 00736 while(1); /* wait until reset */ 00737 } 00738 00743 /* ################################## SysTick function ############################################ */ 00750 #if (__Vendor_SysTickConfig == 0) 00751 00767 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t SysTick_Config(uint32_t ticks) 00768 { 00769 if ((ticks - 1) > SysTick_LOAD_RELOAD_Msk) return (1); /* Reload value impossible */ 00770 00771 SysTick->LOAD = ticks - 1; /* set reload register */ 00772 NVIC_SetPriority (SysTick_IRQn, (1<<__NVIC_PRIO_BITS) - 1); /* set Priority for Systick Interrupt */ 00773 SysTick->VAL = 0; /* Load the SysTick Counter Value */ 00774 SysTick->CTRL = SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Msk | 00775 SysTick_CTRL_TICKINT_Msk | 00776 SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk; /* Enable SysTick IRQ and SysTick Timer */ 00777 return (0); /* Function successful */ 00778 } 00779 00780 #endif 00781 00787 #endif /* __CORE_CM0PLUS_H_DEPENDANT */ 00788 00789 #endif /* __CMSIS_GENERIC */ 00790 00791 #ifdef __cplusplus 00792 } 00793 #endif
